summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account, detailing various debits and credits over the month of December 2016. It includes information about preauthorized debits, service charges, and account balances at the beginning and end of the month.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the account holder for the Deutsche Bank account detailed in the document.

keyFacts: The document details account balances for December 2016, showing a beginning balance of $456,140.07 and an ending balance of $1,518.52.
Multiple preauthorized debits are listed, including payments to ADP for payroll fees and various other charges.
The document indicates that all items are credited subject to final collection and receipt of proceeds in cash.
There are no overdraft fees for the statement period or the calendar year.
The document includes instructions for disputing errors on the account statement.
